pkgmetadata.longdescription: Clinical Graphs and Tables Adhering to Graphical Principles // To enable fit-for-purpose, reusable clinical and medical research focused visualizations and tables with sensible defaults and based on graphical principles as described in: "Vandemeulebroecke et al. (2018)" doi:10.1002/pst.1912, "Vandemeulebroecke et al. (2019)" doi:10.1002/psp4.12455, and "Morris et al. (2019)" doi:10.1136/bmjopen-2019-030215.
